model

Class Move

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Move
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Move
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Move object represents the played Move. The Player (client) that Played the card and the Card of the Move. If the hasDrawnCard attribute is true, this means that the card attribute represents the Card that is drawn from the deck by the player.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
